name: 語言測驗與評量
goals: 透過教科書各章節之研讀，讓修習本課程之學生能深入理解測驗評量的目的、測驗之分類及測驗與教學間密不可分之關係。
透過仔細檢視各學習階段所使用之小考、段考實際試題及會考、大考試題，教導學生在編寫聽、說、讀、寫各種語言能力測驗時，所應注意之原則與要點。
透過測驗評量相關期刊文章之研讀，培養學生日後從事測驗評量相關研究之能力。
syllabus:
Overall Course Structure:

16 weeks of face-to-face instruction plus 2 weeks of self-directed learning

Week 1: Introduction (Orientation; what to look out for in constructing test items)

Week 2: Teaching and Testing (Hughes, 1-7; Heaton, 6-8)

Week 3: Kinds of Test and Testing (Hughes, 8-25; Heaton, 9-22)

Week 4: Validity, Reliability, and Backwash Effects (Hughes, 26-57)

Week 5: Stages of Test Development (Hughes, 58-74; Heaton, 23-36)

Week 6: Test Techniques and Testing Overall Ability (Hughes, 75-82;186-198)

Week 7: Testing Grammar and Vocabulary (Hughes, 172-185)

Week 8: Testing Writing (I) (Hughes, 83-112; Heaton, 96-115)

Week 9: Testing Writing (II)

Week 10: Testing Oral Ability (Hughes, 113-135; Heaton, 59-78)

Week 11: Testing Reading (I) (Hughes, 136-159; Heaton, 79-95)

Week 12: Testing Reading (II)

Week 13: Testing Listening (Hughes, 160-171; Heaton, 37-58);

Week 14: Testing for Young Learners/Continuous Assessment (Hughes, 199-214;

Heaton, 116-125)

Week 15: Presentations of the Constructed Tests (I)

Week 16: Presentations of the Constructed Tests (II)

Week 17: Self-directed Learning

Week 18: Self-directed Learning
prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
